actions.desc: The roachling lord makes two melee attacks or throws two darts.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) poison damage.
actions.name: Begrimed Shortsword

actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) poison damage.
actions.name: Begrimed Dart

name: Roachling Lord
senses: darkvision 60 ft., tremorsense 10 ft., passive Perception 9

special_abilities.desc: The roachling skirmisher has advantage on Constitution saving throws.
special_abilities.name: Resistant

special_abilities.desc: The skirmisher has disadvantage on Performance and Persuasion checks in interactions with nonroachlings.
special_abilities.name: Unlovely
